ee mahatha me bawa sandahan kale “dinamina” ta wishesha prakashayak karamini.kalaka sita warin wara shri lankika dhiwarayan muhudu simawa ullanghanaya kirim athuluwa wiwidha hethun matha indiyanu aarakshaka anshawala athadanguwata pathwu bawa penwa dun maha komasariswaraya janadhipathi mahinda rajapaksha, dhiwara amathi waidya rajitha senarathna mahathwarun indiya rajaya samanga kala sakachchawala prathipalayak lesa me pirisa nidahas kara ganimata haki wu bawa da sandahan kaleya.eeta amatharawa ee mahatha prakasha kale idiriyedi yam heyakin shri lankika dhiwarayek indiya aarakshaka anshawala athadanguwata pathwuye nam derate baladharinge madihathwima matha karyakshamawa ha kadinamin nidahas kirimata piyawara ganna bawaya.yam yam awasthawaladi shri lanka ha indiya dhiwarayan muhuna dun gatalu nirakaranaya kara ganima sandaha derate niyojithayangen samanwitha eekabaddha kamituwak haraha sakachcha kala bawa sihipath kala indiyawe shri lanka maha komasariswaraya dhiwarayan sambandha gatalu nirakaranaya kara ganima sandaha eya athishaya prayojanawath wu bawa da penwa dunneya.shri lankawe ho indiyawe dhiwarayan sambandhayen katayuthu kirimedi wishesha awadhanaya yomu kirima menma owun pilibandawa manushika andamin salaka me piyawara gena thibena bawath, meya derate dhiwarayanta thama wruththiya badhawakin thorawa karagena yama sandaha prayojanawath wana bawa da kiweya.ek awasthawakadi nowa awastha kihipayakadi indiya rajaye niyojithayan samanga pawathi sakachchawala prathipalayak washayen indiya athadanguwe siti shri lankika dhiwarayan siyalu dena saha owun sathu wu nawara yathra nidahas kara ganimata haki wi thibena bawa da indiyawe shri lanka maha komasaris prasad kariyawasam mahatha awadharanaya karayi..

me sambandhayen garu adhikaranaya wisin rupiyal laksha dekaka sharira apa matha withthikaru muda harina lesath siwil widhi widhana nadu sangrahaya yatathe ha aparadha nadu widhi widhana sangrahaya yatathe ganena karunu kawareda yanna polisiya salakilimath wiya yuthu bawath me aakarayata pudgalayinta erehiwa nadu gonu kirimedi katayuthu kala yuthu aakaraya pilibadawa wishesha awadhanaya yomu karana lesa mahesthraththumiya awadharanaya kala athara marthu masa 01 wana dina naduwa kal thabanu labuwa.

esema me gatalu sambandhayen aayathanaye sabhapathiwarayatath, janamadhya amathyanshaye lekamwarayatath thawath boho pirisakatath likhitha danumdim kara thibe.
